A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While this movie may be divided and clearly the internet has a mutual feeling all the way. I will say that I actually liked this movie because of how daring it was to do the complete opposite of every theory being thought up at the time. Sure I can see why some don't like this movie\, but I can also see why some like this film. \nNo matter if you like this movie or not\, I think it's perfectly clear that all of us\, as a fan base\, care deeply for this franchise and want it to be; here's a real shocker\, \"Fun\". I may be of the minority on this\, but seriously; are we really willing to let differences in opinion ruin what used to be a fun and exciting franchise where we could laugh about the mistakes and still have long discussions about why we love this franchise.
